dataset.title: Biodiversity Databases of Cape Cluster Parks

abstract.para: The known species of plants, mammals, birds, reptiles, frogs, fish, and selected invertibrates; for Bontebok National Park (BNP), Table Mountain National Park (TMNP), West Coast National Park (WCNP), Agulhas National Park (ANP), and Namaqua National Park (NNP).

intellectualRights.para:
Terms and conditions of use – SANParks CRC Biodiversity Database
General The following disclaimer applies to the Biodiversity database. By using this database you are agreeing to be bound by the terms outlined in this disclaimer. SANParks may change the terms and conditions of the disclaimer at any time without giving notice. SANParks has no liability for the inability of anyone to access this database, or any information or material in it. Furthermore, we do not guarantee that this database will operate without interruption nor do we commit to ensuring that this database remains available beyond the lifespan of the project.
Use of information SANParks is the owner of the Biodiversity database. Information provided in this database is available to you for research purposes only. Permission should be obtained from SANParks CRC for other uses. Any product or publication that is based wholly or in part on information contained in this database must acknowledge SANParks CRC as the source of the information and cite the database.
Some of the information contained in the database is own or copyrighted by others and used by SANParks with permission; including SANBI, the ADU. If information from the Biodiversity database is used it is the sole responsibility of you, the user of this database, to carefully examine the content of the Biodiversity database and all linked pages for copyright restrictions and to secure the necessary permissions.
Content accuracy The online version of the Biodiversity database will be uploaded to the SANParks Data Repository (SDR) in 2011 with metadata produced using Morpho, and will be a more recent version than previously presented. Although SANParks and the CRC make every effort to provide accurate, complete, useable and timely information on this database, neither we nor any third parties make representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, that any information contained in the database is accurate, up to date or complete. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. SANParks and CRC accepts no liability for any loss or damage caused arising from your use of this database.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: The National Parks of Cape Floristic Region and the Succulent Karoo of South Africa
